summary: A Novice conjuration spell that will summon a weaker version of the bound bow. Take 150 gold to craft the tome, under 'misc,' at any forge. The spell costs 100 base magicka, so all characters should be able to use it without having to put points into magicka. Attacks with the bow will actually level conjuration! Perfect for purists!
descriptionHtml:
A Novice conjuration spell that will summon a weaker version of the bound bow. Take 150 gold to craft the tome, under 'misc,' at any forge. The spell costs 100 base magicka, so all characters should be able to use it without having to put points into magicka. Attacks with the bow will actually level conjuration! Perfect for purists!

The spell will be affected by the mystic weapon perk and the novice conjuration perk.

The bow lasts as long as the vanilla bound bow.

Damage is 24 (including arrows) at base and 32 (including arrows) with the mystic weapon perk.
author: LunarMagister7
